descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/10243-1-1430138382.png[/img]


Description
==========
This is a very large ADULT orientated dwemer style Dungeon/Temple/Player home just near the Reach Stormcloak Camp
Features 88 NPCs includings followers, guards, vendors, slaves and pet huskies (also includes 2 summon spells available from magic vendor downstairs)
Arena with fighting ladies (use switch near throne in arena to start the fight leave cell to reset), Weapons Room and bar, Private Bedroom and Library ,Pool and Bar area, caves with gardens,underground lakes and rivers
Numerous Guest rooms, Alchemy Study, Observatory, SM style dungeon/study, Cells for prisoners,2 seperate blacksmiths
Weapons and magic display areas lots of safe storage
2 Kitchens & staff rooms.
Private baths all nicely furnished.
All Npcs in Pool /bar area and Weapons room bar area as well as NPCs in Private areas can be companions and can be married. Note they are all high level.
Nice view from upper entrance 3 Horses 2 stables, workshops with all cons Forge, tanning racks etc

Note...
some high level items around the place if you dont like that dont pick them up.
The NPCs are all high level if you dont like that dont get them to follow you.

This is a very detailed mod although optimized as best i can it will require a high end pc too run it, if you get infinite loading screens, only go through 2 cells then save and reload that save.

This mod is ADULTS ONLY and has nudity and bondage references throughout,
there will not be a toned down version nor will there be a version suited more to women.
If anyone wants to do one they are welcome just let me know before release.
IM NOT INTERESTED IN NAKED WOMEN COMPLAINTS OR LORE COMPLAINERS
COMMENTS ON THOSE SUBJECTS WILL NOT BE TOLERATED
ALSO NOT INTERESTED IN TES5 EDIT COMMENTS



Bugs
====
There are some minor lighting issues and roombound issues (sometimes you get a flash between rooms) there are only few of them but they will be fixed for final release.

Although cleaned with tes edit you will still get some navmesh errors and deleted reference errors, navmesh errors with tes5edit will occur when you modify large amount of exterior cell navmeshes this doesnt harm anything but will mean any mod modifying the same ext cells will cause a ctd.
THIS WILL NOT CHANGE so anything changing the same exterior cells as eden will cause a ctd and will conflict.

Deleted reference errors despite what is said by some its never been proven that deleting exterior object will affect the game except by causing a conflict with any mod
that edits the same exterior cells. Eden take up 6 exterior cells and will conflict with anything that changes any of those cells.
As far as i know there are no mods that change these cells but............

Arena fight start and reset is a little buggy but it works, i cant get it working any better
========

Details
=======
Lower entrance is near Reach Stormcloak Camp
Upper Entrance is near Hunters Retreat
Both map markers are enabled
It's free, all you need to do is enter the front door

Credits
...Solo for the original concept of Solace (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20265) although this started of changing Solace to suit me
... its gone far away from that now but the original base cavern concept and idea in entrance hall should be credited to solo

...Many of the dungeon ideas also come from a mod called EVIL LAIR OF HYDRA by hydralisk77 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12556)

1, shedidwhat for converting Growlfs slave chains
2, Blary for his resources
3, Insanity for his resources available here.........http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php
4, Runrespect for his resources
5, Growlf for the slave armor
6, Petrovich for the UNP Leather Clothes
7, TESA for more resources all available here.........http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php
8, Breti for more resources
9, Neo for his Tina boots
10, Little Baron for art frame mesh
11, MJY for more resources
12 Tamira/Stroti for more geat resources
12, If ive left you out please let me know

My beta testers

Gentester For testing and friendship check out her great work here......http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/647612
LordRahl for testing
Aquariumreef for testing
shedidwhat for testing
darkshot64 for testing

Install
=======
1. Extract the files from both archives to a temporary location.
2. Move all files to (install folder)\Skyrim\Data\
3. enable Edenforrelease esp
4. Edenforrelease esp must be at the end of your load order or after any other exterior mods

In case of any trouble, please don't hesitate to contact me at http://www.skyrimrealestate.com/forum/index.php and I will try to help you
to the best of my ability.

Please visit http://www.skyrimrealestate.com home of the best house mods for Skyrim

You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of
this mod.

Name: Eden
Author Brendan62
Version: V1.0
Date: 3/4/2013
Requirements Dawguard (although not dependant on dawnguard esm) Skyrim 1.9.32
Homepage: http://www.skyrimrealestate.com/forum/index.php
author: brendan62
